column3: yā malīḥ fī al-qalb lā yaghīb

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. mashriqī. zajalun li’abī al-ḥusn al-shshtrī
al-ṣan‘ah. mashriqī. tawshīḥ li’aḥmad bn al-ḥusn al-mawṣilī
al-ṣan‘ah. mashriqī. mkhl‘ al-basīṭ lisayyidī muḥammad al-ḥarrāq

column2: yā man ghadā fī fu’ādī sākin

column1: : m’khūdh man qā’imin wanuṣif al-ṣan‘ah. ḥijāz mashriqī. tawshīḥun li’abī mudīn al-ghawth

column3: wāunẓur ilá wajhih kālbadr idh kamulā

column2: unẓur ilá thaghrih tabṣur sanā dhahabin

column1: m’khūdh man basīṭ al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥijāz mashriqī. zajal
: m’khūdh man bṭāyḥī al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ḥijāz mashriqī. zajal
: m’khūdh man bṭāyḥī al-ṣan‘ah. mashriqī. mkhl‘ al-basīṭ li’abī: al-ḥusn al-shshtrī
al-ṣan‘ah. mashriqī. tawshīḥ muḍāri‘ lābin al-khaṭīb
